budget_title: Unclassified REPROGRAMMING ACTION - INTERNAL REPROGRAMMING Pag
explanation: Funds are required in the following budget line items (BLI) to properly align funding with projected costs and to support congressional intent. The evolving nature of Ukraine support requirements resulted in adjustments to mission tasking impacting the Navyâ€™s requirements for ship operations and additional costs for port visits and repair parts by the USS Gerald R. Ford Carrier Strike Group while operating in the U.S. European Command (EUCOM) Area of Responsibility. Also required are costs to support maintenance of USS Kearsarge returning from U.S. European Command (EUCOM) Area of Responsibility supporting NATO. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement. This reprogramming does not alter congressional intent. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
